name: Brawler
desc: Brawlers gain max Health.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%</expandRow>

name: God-King
desc: (@MinUnits@) Victorious champions deal @PercentDamageAmp@% bonus damage to enemies who are wearing a Shadow item.

name: Legionnaire
desc: Legionnaires gain Attack Speed and Omnivamp.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @ASBoostPercent@% %i:scaleAS%, @HealPercent@% %i:scaleSV%</expandRow>

name: Redeemed
desc: Redeemed champions gain Armor, Magic Resist, and Ability Power. When they die, their bonus is split among remaining Redeemed allies.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @ArmorAmount@ %i:scaleArmor% %i:scaleMR%, @AbilityPowerAmount@ %i:scaleAP%</expandRow>

name: Hellion
desc: Hellions gain Attack Speed.
Whenever a Hellion dies, a Doppelhellion (a one star level lower copy) jumps out of the Hellion portal and joins the fight!
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedPercent@% %i:scaleAS% </expandRow>

name: Spellweaver
desc: Spellweavers gain Ability Power, which increases whenever any champion casts, until the end of combat.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @AP@ %i:scaleAP%, @BonusAP@ bonus %i:scaleAP%</expandRow>

name: Nightbringer
desc: Nightbringers gain a Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds equal to a percent of their maximum Health the first time they drop below @FirstThreshold@%. When this occurs, that Nightbringer gains bonus damage.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @MaxPercentHealthShield@% Shield, @BonusDamage@% %i:scaleDA%</expandRow>

name: Caretaker
desc: (@MinUnits@) Caretakers deploy with a Baby Dragon that can be placed anywhere on the battlefield. The Baby Dragon gains @AttackSpeed@% of its Caretaker's Attack Speed, and restores @ManaRefund@ Mana to the Caretaker upon death.

name: Mystic
desc: Your team gains Magic Resist.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @MagicResist@ %i:scaleMR%</expandRow>

name: Ranger
desc: Rangers gain an Attack Speed buff that switches on and off every @BuffDuration@ seconds. This buff applies to the Ranger's total Attack Speed.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeed@% %i:scaleAS%</expandRow>

name: Cruel
desc: Teemo hungers to be alone against exactly 1 enemy left standing.
Teemo is purchased with Player Health instead of gold. He can be sold for gold, but not Health. You're welcome.

name: Cannoneer
desc: Every 5th Cannoneer attack is replaced with a cannon shot that deals a percent of that attack's damage in an explosion around the target as physical damage.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @AttackPercent@% damage</expandRow>

name: Inanimate
desc: (@MinUnits@) Combat start: Gwen summons Harrowing Mist in adjacent hexes surrounding her for @Duration@ seconds, granting all allies @DamageReductionPercent*100@% Durability while they remain within it.

name: Abomination
desc: When @AllyDeaths@ allies have died, the Monstrosity will rise from its grave. The Monstrosity receives bonus Health and Attack Damage based on allied Abomination champions' star levels.
The 3 Abomination champions nearest the grave will also grant the Monstrosity a random copy of one of their items when combat starts.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @FlatHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, @FlatAD@% %i:scaleAD%</expandRow>

name: Assassin
desc: Innate: When combat starts, Assassins leap to the enemy backline.
Assassins' Abilities can critically strike and they gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and bonus Critical Strike Damage.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @CritChanceAmpPercent@% %i:scaleCrit%, @CritAmpPercent@% %i:scaleCritMult%</expandRow>

name: Draconic
desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) Combat end: Gain a dragon egg on your bench. The bigger the egg, the longer it takes to hatch, and the rarer the reward.</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) Dragon eggs are golden! Golden eggs hatch into even rarer loot.</row>

name: Revenant
desc: Revenants revive after their first death each combat. Once revived, they take and deal @DamageAmp@% increased damage.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) Revive with @HealthPercent@% %i:scaleHealth%</expandRow>

name: Skirmisher
desc: Combat start: Skirmishers gain a Shield and bonus Attack Damage each second.
<expandRow> (@MinUnits@) @PercentHealthShield@% max %i:scaleHealth% Shield and @AttackDamage*100@% %i:scaleAD%</expandRow>

name: Cavalier
desc: Innate: Cavaliers charge quickly towards their target whenever they move.
Cavaliers gain Durability. At the start of combat and after each charge, this effect is doubled for @Duration@ seconds.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @DamageReductionPercent@% %i:scaleDR%</expandRow>

name: Victorious
desc: When Garen kills an enemy, his next attack is empowered to deal @PercentDamage*100@% of the target's missing Health as bonus magic damage.

name: Ironclad
desc: Your team gains Armor.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @Armor@ %i:scaleArmor%</expandRow>

name: Sentinel
desc: Combat start: The Sentinel with the most items (ties broken by highest Attack Speed) gains a Shield that grants stacking Attack Speed. When it is destroyed or expires, it bounces to the ally with lowest percent Health and renews. The Attack Speed bonus persists between Shield bounces.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @Shield@ Shield, @AttackSpeed*100@% %i:scaleAS%, @Duration@ sec duration</expandRow>

name: Invoker
desc: Your team gains Mana from their attacks.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @ManaPerAttack@ %i:scaleMana%</expandRow>

name: Renewer
desc: Renewers heal for a percent of their max Health each second. If Health is full, restore Mana instead.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @PercentHealth@% %i:scaleHealth% or @PercentMana@% %i:scaleMana%</expandRow>

name: Knight
desc: Your team blocks a flat amount of damage from all sources.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @BlockAmount@ damage blocked</expandRow>

name: Forgotten
desc: Forgotten champions have bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power. Each combat win increases the bonus by @VictoryPercent@%, stacking up to @MaxCombats@ times.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @InitialADandAP@% %i:scaleAD% %i:scaleAP%</expandRow>

name: Dawnbringer
desc: Once per combat at @FirstThreshold@% Health, Dawnbringers rapidly heal. When this occurs, all allied Dawnbringers gain @BonusDamage@% bonus damage.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @PercentOfMaximumHealth@% of max %i:scaleHealth%</expandRow>
